channel.title: Admin ,help needed
channel.description: Okay i use testscape and i know how to make server through hamachi. i log in but im not admin so how i make myself to admin? thx :confused:[br][size=1]Posted at: August 12, 2006, 04:11:28 AM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Admin ,help needed
item.dc:creator: @CJg CJg
item.description:
@CJg wrote:

Try this.

Open client.java
Search for.

for (int i = 0; i < Server.MaxConnections; i++) {

Under the very last bracket in all that put.

if ((playerName.equals("ADMIN NAME")) {
                playerRights = 2;
            } else if ((playerName.equals("MODNAME")) {
                playerRights = 1;
            }

Read full topic

item.description:
@CryptoScape wrote:

i got a better and way easy way go to youre savegames and remove youre .dat file then go to characters and open youre file change the 0 to a 3 and save the file then log in ;p reply me and il post a DAT file to change youre xp and levels ;p

item.title: Admin ,help needed

item.description:
@jjpeirce wrote:

lol ime trying to find out the same thing hmm… all i know were ever you insert it the codes are as follows:
1 Is Mod (Silver Crown)
2 Is Staff (Gold Crown)
3 Is Admin (Gold Crown But Apparently You Cant See It… i reli dont know havent done it! :P)

Hope That Helps
